## S3

### download/upload files

```python
import boto3
import pandas as pd

file = "my_file.csv"
key = "my_folder/" + file
bucket = "my_bucket"

# download
s3 = boto3.client("s3")
obj = s3.get_object(Bucket=bucket, Key=key)
df = pd.read_csv(obj['Body'])

# upload
s3 = boto3.resource("s3")
df.to_csv(file, index=False)
s3.meta.client.upload_file(file, Bucket=bucket, Key=key)
```


### list objects

```python
s3.list_objects_v2(
    Bucket,
    Prefix,
    Delimiter,
    Maxkey
)
```
